title: Verify backend payload shapes (training history/foals)
description: Confirm actual fields for horse training history, foal development/activity, and adjust TS interfaces/hooks accordingly; normalize discipline status record vs array.

title: Epic: Account Recovery
description: Retain players who forget passwords. Important for user retention. (4-6 hours)

title: Forgot Password Page
description: Build forgot password with email input, generic success message. File: pages/ForgotPasswordPage.tsx (2-3h)

title: Reset Password Page
description: Build reset password with token from URL, new password fields. File: pages/ResetPasswordPage.tsx (2-3h)

title: Update MSW coverage and lock
description: MSW added but package-lock.json not updated; handlers missing auth login/register/logout and error cases. Update lockfile and add handlers.

title: Expand MSW coverage for auth and error cases
description: MSW handlers missing auth login/register/logout and error scenarios; add coverage and update package-lock with msw dependency.

title: Reduce synchronous logging overhead
description: Heavy per-request logging will bottleneck at high RPS. Switch to async/buffered logging and reduce log volume for hot paths.

title: Fix breeding filters (sex vs gender)
description: Breeding UI filters on gender but backend returns sex (stallion/mare/gelding). Normalize to sex and lowercase values so lists populate.

title: Add training/breeding API hooks and UI stubs
description: Implement React Query hooks for training and breeding endpoints, extend api-client with typed endpoints, and add integration-ready training/breeding components

title: Story 3-4 Task 8: Testing & Polish for XP Progression Display
Add rate limiting/backpressure
description: No per-route rate limiting; at 10k rps routes will overwhelm app/DB. Implement rate limiting/throttling on hot paths (training/horse/foal) and global backpressure.

title: Unblock frontend tests in OneDrive
description: Vitest/esbuild spawn EPERM in OneDrive; npm wrapper logs npm-prefix errors. Need workable Node/npm setup or alternate path to run tests.

title: Add CSRF protection for cookie auth
description: Cookie-based auth lacks CSRF mitigation. Enable SameSite on auth cookies and add CSRF token middleware/double-submit or Origin checks for state-changing routes.

title: Secure foal endpoints
description: Foal routes (/api/foals/:id/development, activity, enrich, reveal-traits) are unauthenticated. Add auth, ownership checks, and rate limiting.

title: Align training API types and payloads
description: Frontend training client/types don't match backend: /training/status returns record, /training/trainable/:userId expects UUID and uses sex not gender, TrainingResult shape differs. Update types/parsing, use correct user identifier, and fix Level placeholder.

title: Add training history panel test
description: Cover TrainingHistoryPanel rendering with mocked training and horse history hooks

title: Secure foal routes
description: Foal endpoints unauthenticated (development/activity/enrich/reveal). Add auth, ownership checks, rate limiting.

title: Secure horse routes and trainable listing
description: Horses endpoints (/horses, /horses/trainable/:userId) lack auth/ownership checks. Require auth, enforce userId === session user, and rate limit to prevent enumeration.

title: Implement retry buttons for failed data fetches in Progression Tab
description: Add retry button UI to error states in Progression Tab components (XPProgressBar, StatProgressionChart, RecentGains, AgeUpCounter, TrainingRecommendations). Currently when data fetch fails, components show error message but no retry option. Test exists but skipped (HorseDetailPage.ProgressionTab.test.tsx:636 - 'should provide retry button for failed data fetches'). Components should add retry button that calls React Query's refetch() method to retry failed API calls.

title: Align frontend training client to backend UUID and status record
description: Frontend still passes numeric userId to /training/trainable/:userId and assumes array status; backend expects UUID and returns discipline-keyed object. Align identifiers and parsing to prevent request failures and data leaks.

title: Reference legacy claude docs in index
description: Add archive references in docs/index.md for .claude docs (auth implementation plan, optimization summary, tech stack, project milestones)

title: Epic: Breeding Experience
description: Enable players to create new horses with desirable traits. Advanced gameplay. (8-10 hours)

title: Breeding Center
description: Build breeding center with tabs: My Mares, Stud Marketplace, History. Files: components/breeding/BreedingCenter.tsx, hooks/api/useBreeding.ts (4-5h)

title: Breeding Pair Selector
description: Build side-by-side mare/stallion comparison with prediction display, inbreeding warning. Files: BreedingPairSelector.tsx, types/breeding.ts (4-5h)

title: Foal Development Tracker
description: Build tracker with progress bar, bonding/stress meters, enrichment activities. File: FoalDevelopmentTracker.tsx (3-4h)

title: Scale plan: clustering and DB pool
description: System not ready for 10k rps: single-process Node and default Prisma pool will saturate. Add clustering/horizontal scale and tune DB pool/connection limits.

title: Secure training routes with auth/ownership
description: Training endpoints are unauthenticated (/api/training/*). Add auth middleware, derive userId from session, enforce ownership, and rate limit.

title: Fix training dashboard placeholders and queries
description: TrainingDashboard shows garbled Level placeholder and TrainingHistoryPanel queries history with horseId 0 when none selected. Use sane placeholder and add enabled guard.

title: Secure horses endpoints
description: GET /horses and /horses/trainable/:userId lack auth/ownership checks. Require auth, enforce userId == session user, add rate limiting.

title: Add caching for hot reads
description: No caching; hot reads (trainable horses, horse status) always hit DB. Add in-memory/Redis cache for frequently accessed data to survive high throughput.

title: Fix breeding filters for sex field
description: Breeding UI filters on gender but backend returns sex (stallion/mare/gelding). Normalize to sex and handle lowercase values so selections populate.

title: Epic: Player Onboarding
description: Enable new players to create accounts and start playing. Critical path - nothing works without auth. (9-12 hours)

title: Login Page
description: Build login with email/password, validation, error handling, redirect on success. File: pages/LoginPage.tsx (3-4h)

title: Registration Page
description: Build registration with all fields, password strength, terms checkbox. File: pages/RegisterPage.tsx (4-5h)

title: Email Verification Page
description: Build verification page that reads token from URL and auto-verifies. File: pages/EmailVerificationPage.tsx (2-3h)

title: Epic: Horse Training Experience
description: Enable players to improve their horses for competitions. Core gameplay loop. (6-8 hours)

title: Training Dashboard
description: Build dashboard listing horses with training status, cooldown timers, eligibility filter. Files: components/training/TrainingDashboard.tsx, hooks/api/useTraining.ts (4-5h)

title: Training Session Modal
description: Build modal for discipline selection and training execution. Shows horse stats, 23 disciplines, results. Files: TrainingSessionModal.tsx, DisciplineSelector.tsx (3-4h)
notes: ✅ DisciplineSelector component complete (67 lines, 19/19 tests). ✅ TrainingSessionModal refactored with all 23 disciplines (34/34 tests). ✅ HorseStatsCard component complete (75 lines, 21/21 tests passing). ✅ HorseStatsCard integrated into modal. ✅ Git commit: 6988a4f pushed to GitHub. ⏳ Next: Training Results Display (25% remaining - show results AFTER training completes)

title: Secure training routes
description: Training endpoints unauthenticated (check-eligibility/train/status/trainable). Add auth, derive userId from session, enforce ownership, rate limit.

title: Epic: Technical Foundation
description: Enable all frontend features to communicate with backend. Build first - other epics depend on this. (5-7 hours)

title: API Client with Cookie Authentication
description: Create frontend/src/lib/api.ts with credentials: 'include'. Handle 401/429 errors. Files: api.ts, types/api.ts (2-3h)

title: Auth API Hooks
description: Create React Query hooks: useLogin, useRegister, useCurrentUser, useLogout, useForgotPassword, useResetPassword. File: hooks/api/useAuth.ts (2-3h)

title: Auth Context Provider
description: Create AuthProvider and useAuth hook. Provides user, isLoading, isAuthenticated, logout. File: contexts/AuthContext.tsx (1-2h)

title: Validation Schemas
description: Create Zod schemas for auth forms matching backend rules. File: lib/validations/auth.ts (1h)

title: Add project overview doc
description: Document project overview and link from docs index

title: Wire training history and breeding filters
description: Add horse training history display and gender-based mare/stallion selection for breeding; extend horses API client and hooks

title: Optimize training status query
description: Training status all-disciplines does N+1 calls per request; at high load it explodes DB usage. Refactor to single query/batch, reduce DB round trips.

title: Align training client to backend shapes
description: Frontend training client assumes array status and TrainingResult fields; backend returns discipline-keyed object and different result shape. Fix types/parsing and use UUID userId for trainable.
